sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM dyform.DY_961338295639576 where 1=1
column5 like '%$netName$%'
column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
$sortCondition$ limit #startIndex#,#pageSize#

SELECT ifnull(count(*),0) as count FROM dyform.DY_961338295639576 where 1=1
column5 like '%$netName$%'
column13 like '%$createPerson$%'

SELECT lsh lsh, ifnull(column5,'') netName FROM dyform.DY_961338295639576 t where 1=1
column5 like '%$netName$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
order by column5

SELECT DISTINCT DATE(t.column12) createDate, t.lsh lsh, IFNULL(t.column13,'') createPerson, IFNULL(t.column16,'') AS POINT, IFNULL(t2.column5,'') netName, COUNT(*) AS total FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh where 1=1 and t.column12 IS NOT NULL and t.fatherlsh = #fatherlsh#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
group by netName,createDate order by netName,createDate desc

SELECT ifnull(t3.column3,'') ppid, ifnull(t3.column4,'') ppname FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t3 ON t3.column3=t.column15 where 1=1 and t.column12 IS NOT NULL and t3.column4 is not null
t.fatherlsh = #fatherlsh#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
t2.column5 like '%$netName$%'
t3.column4 like '%$ppname$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
t.column16 = #point#
group by ppname order by ppname

SELECT ifnull(date(t.column12),'') times FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t3 ON t3.column3=t.column15 where 1=1 and t.column12 IS NOT NULL
t.fatherlsh = #fatherlsh#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
t2.column5 like '%$netName$%'
t3.column4 like '%$ppname$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
t.column16 = #point#
group by times order by times

SELECT ifnull(t2.column5,'') netname FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t3 ON t3.column3=t.column15 where 1=1 and t.column12 IS NOT NULL
t.fatherlsh = #fatherlsh#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
t2.column5 like '%$netName$%'
t3.column4 like '%$ppname$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
t.column16 = #point#
group by netname order by netname

SELECT t.lsh lsh, ifnull(t.column12,'') createDate, ifnull(t.column13,'') createPerson, ifnull(t.column16,'') as point, ifnull(t3.column4,'') ppname, ifnull(t2.column5,'') netName, ifnull(files.address,'') address, files.unid as fileunid FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t3 ON t3.column3=t.column15 LEFT JOIN iss.t_file files ON files.d_unid=t.lsh where 1=1
date(t.column12) = #queryDate#
t2.lsh = #fatherlsh#
t3.column3 = #ppid#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
t2.column5 like '%$netName$%'
t3.column4 like '%$ppname$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
t.column16 = #point#
order by netName,createDate,ppname limit #startIndex#,#pageSize#

SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) as v FROM dyform.DY_211340244752515 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 t2 ON t2.lsh=t.fatherlsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t3 ON t3.column3=t.column15 LEFT JOIN iss.t_file files ON files.d_unid=t.lsh where 1=1
date(t.column12) = #queryDate#
t2.lsh = #fatherlsh#
t3.column3 = #ppid#
date(t.column12) >= #beginDate#
date(t.column12) <= #endDate#
t2.column5 like '%$netName$%'
t3.column4 like '%$ppname$%'
t.column13 like '%$createPerson$%'
t.column16 = #point#
sqlMap.update: update dyform.DY_211340244752515 set column16=#point# where LSH=#lsh#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT hh.outletsId outletsId, dy1.column5 outletsName, hh.brandId brandId, dy2.column4 brandName, IFNULL(tt.ywybm,'') ywybm, IFNULL(tt.ywyname,'') ywyname, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week1),0) w1,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz1),0) f1, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week2),0) w2,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz2),0) f2, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week3),0) w3,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz3),0) f3, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week4),0) w4,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz4),0) f4, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week5),0) w5,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz5),0) f5, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week6),0) w6,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz6),0) f6, IFNULL(SUM(tt.week7),0) w7,IFNULL(SUM(tt.fz7),0) f7, IFNULL(COUNT(tt.times),'') totalx, SUM(hh.times * (WEEK('$endDate$')-WEEK('$beginDate$')+1)) timesx, IFNULL((SUM(tt.fz1)+SUM(tt.fz2)+SUM(tt.fz3)+SUM(tt.fz4)+SUM(tt.fz5)+SUM(tt.fz6)+SUM(tt.fz7) ),0) totalf FROM iss.t_tallyconfig hh LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.lsh lsh576,t.column5 wdmc,IFNULL(us.name,'') ywyname,IFNULL(t1.PARTICIPANT,'') ywybm,IFNULL(t1.column15,'') px, IFNULL(t2.column4,'') pxm,IFNULL(t1.timex,'') times,t2.lsh brandId, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=2 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week1, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=3 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week2, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=4 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week3, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=5 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week4, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=6 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week5, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=7 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week6, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=1 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.TIMEX))ELSE '' END week7, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=2 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz1, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=3 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz2, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=4 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz3, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=5 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz4, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=6 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz5, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=7 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz6, CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE(t1.timex))=1 AND IFNULL(t1.column16,0)='1' THEN IFNULL(t1.column16,0) ELSE 0 END fz7 FROM dyform.DY_961338295639576 t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_211340244752515 t1 ON t.LSH = t1.FATHERLSH LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 t2 ON t1.column15 = t2.column3 LEFT JOIN netone.t_cs_user us ON t1.PARTICIPANT = us.USERCODE WHERE 1=1
DATE(t1.TIMEX) >= #beginDate#
DATE(t1.TIMEX) <= #endDate#
t.lsh =#wdms#
t1.PARTICIPANT =#clientId#
t1.column15 =#px#
GROUP BY ywybm,lsh576,px,DATE(t1.TIMEX) ORDER BY ywybm,lsh576,px,t1.TIMEX DESC ) AS tt ON hh.outletsId = tt.lsh576 AND hh.brandId=tt.brandId LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 dy1 ON dy1.LSH = hh.outletsId LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 dy2 ON dy2.LSH = hh.brandId GROUP BY $sb$ ORDER BY hh.outletsId,hh.brandId DESC
SELECT lsh lshId,column3 proCode,column4 proName FROM dyform.DY_171345119981583 ORDER BY column3 desc

SELECT t.lsh tallId, t.outletsId outletsId,wd.column5 outletsName, t.brandId brandId,px.column4 brandName, t.usercode userCode,uc.userName userName, t.times times,t.status statusx,concat(t.createdDate,'') creadDate,t.note note,t.operate operate FROM iss.t_tallyconfig t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 wd ON t.outletsId = wd.lsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 px ON t.brandId = px.lsh LEFT JOIN iss.t_user uc ON t.usercode = uc.userCode WHERE 1=1
brandId = #lshId#
(wd.column5 like '%$condition$%' or px.column4 like '%$condition$%' or t.times like '%$condition$%' )
SELECT lsh outId,column5 outName FROM dyform.DY_961338295639576 WHERE lsh NOT IN( SELECT outletsId FROM iss.t_tallyconfig WHERE brandId=#lshId# ) and column5 like '%$name$%'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-','') as lsh
INSERT INTO iss.t_tallyconfig(lsh,outletsId,brandId,times,status,createdDate,note,operate) VALUES( #lsh#, #outletsId#, #brandId#, #times#, #statusx#, #createdDate#, #note#, #operate# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE iss.t_tallyconfig SET
times=#times#,
note=#note#,
createdDate=#createdDate#, operate=#operate# WHERE lsh=#tallId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t.lsh tallId, t.outletsId outletsId,IFNULL(wd.column5,'') outletsName, t.brandId brandId,IFNULL(px.column4,'') brandName, t.usercode userCode,uc.userName userName, IFNULL(t.times,0) times, CASE WHEN t.status = 1 THEN '启用' ELSE '禁用' END statusx, t.createdDate creadDate, IFNULL(t.note,'') note, t.operate operate FROM iss.t_tallyconfig t LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_961338295639576 wd ON t.outletsId = wd.lsh LEFT JOIN dyform.DY_171345119981583 px ON t.brandId = px.lsh LEFT JOIN iss.t_user uc ON t.usercode = uc.userCode WHERE 1=1
t.brandId = #lshId#
t.lsh in
#tallId[]#
ORDER BY brandId,creadDate
